resources.string: "You have encountered an ancient automated ship defending the %1$s system and they have allowed your fleet to retreat this time only with a warning not to return"
You are being attacked, select manual or auto
Asteroids will block travel and targeting
"Ion Storms will reduce targeting by 50% if it is between the attacker and defender"
"Auto can be turned on and off during the battle, the top right button will set all of your ships to retreat."
Reduces fleet movement speed by half within %1$d ly of the blackhole
Select, edit, or create a build list
Improves the climate of the planet

For the modding setting change to take effect the game will close and you will need to open the game again
Unable to farm in this climate,
Our military leaders have learned that another empire is unable to control their colony.
A colony under the rule of another empire has started to resist their leadership.
We have learned that a colony is resisting the rule of another empire.
We have learned about the weakness of another empire, who is unable to control their colony.
"We have received a report that another colony is resisting the rule of it's empire."
"A colony on another world is resisting the rule of their empire. This is an obvious problem when empires don't work as one mind."
A colony on another world is resisting the rule of their empire. Perhaps kindness could have helped.
Our colony on %1$s is dishonoring our empire by resisting our rule.
Our colony on %1$s has begun to resist our rule. We have sent a delegation of diplomats to solve this problem.
Our colony on %1$s has lost sight of the Light and is resisting us.
Our colony on %1$s is resisting us. While we are impressed with their strength, we must bring them back under our rule.
Our colony on %1$s has started to resist our rule. They will stop resisting, eventually. We must have patience.
Our colony on %1$s has pulled away from the swarm and is resisting our rule.
Our colony on %1$s has begun a revolt. It appears that they have stepped away from the joy of friendship and the amazement of science.
This icon above a fleet means that a colony ship has arrived at a star system that has a planet that can be colonized
"This is the food, production, and science control. This controls what the population of the colony will work on."
"This shows how much food, production, and science the colony produces each turn."
"These slider buttons control the percentages of what the population works on."
Depending on if the planet can farm or not the number of slider buttons will change.
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."

"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
Reports indicate another race has experienced a major computer virus.
Word has come that another race has suffered a computer virus affecting their research.
We have been informed that another race has suffered a major computer virus. This has come about them due to their unrighteousness.
Another races computers have been infected by a virus.
We have been informed of a major computer virus happening to another race. Our systems however remain in perfect operating condition.
Another races computers have been infected by a virus causing them to lose research.
Another races computers have been struck by a computer virus. Our scientists are increasing our cyber security.
Our scientists have experienced a loss of %1$d research points due to a computer virus.
Our researchers have suffered a setback and lost %1$d research points due to a major computer virus.
We have had our computers infected by a virus setting our research back by %1$d points.
Our computers have been weakened by a virus. Our research has suffered, %1$d research points lost.
The code has been corrupted, our research projects have been set back due to the virus by %1$d research points.
We have been set back in our research by %1$d points due to our computer systems being infected by a virus.
Our science gains have been devastated by a computer virus. We have lost %1$d research points.
Are you sure you want to?
Attacking will cause you to go to war with the
Want to turn auto build off?
Auto build for this colony is currently on and will override tradegoods
This action will cause the scrapping of the %1$s
Scrapping these %1$d ships will get you %2$d
Scrapping these %1$d ships will get you nothing
Scrapping this ship will get you %1$d
Scrapping this ship will get you nothing
Many credits have just been donated to another race in the galaxy.
A very charitable donator has just given another race many credits. It seems a waste that it was not given to us.
It is not all darkness and gloom in the galaxy. We have just heard of someone donating credits to another race.
An anonymous donor has given credits to an another race.
It is strange the interactions between intelligent life forms. It seems someone has donated a large amount of credits to another race.
Someone has just donated a large amount of credits to another race.
Kindness has once again been spread in the galaxy. An anonymous donor has given credits to another race.
An anonymous donor has given us %1$d credits, Glory and Honor be unto them.
We are grateful for the donation of %1$d credits we just received. The Human Alliance will surely put them to best use.
Someone has blessed us with a donation of %1$d credits. May the Light uphold them in their generosity.
This surprising gift of %1$d credits will help to make the mighty Dargathi stronger.
We are surprised to have received a donation of %1$d credits. The anonymous nature of this donation does not compute.
"The random donation of %1$d credits will help the Swarm and in it's spreading."
Someone has chosen to share their kindness with us in the form of %1$d credits. We are incredibly grateful for their generosity.
A very unhonorable thing has happened to another race. They have had a vast sum of credits stolen from them.
We need to keep a close eye on our funds. Thieves in the galaxy have stolen from another race.
Darkness spreads throughout the galaxy evil deeds are continually done. Another race has had credits stolen.
Another race was too relaxed with their security. Many credits were stolen from them.
An uncalculated event has happened to another race, many credits were stolen from them.
Reports indicate that another race has had credits stolen from them.
Another race has had credits stolen from them. We are deeply disappointed that someone could be this unkind.
Does no one have any honor in this galaxy? We have just been robbed %1$d credits.
This is a great embarrassment to us. Someone has stolen %1$d credits from us.
A great sin has been committed against us. %1$d credits was stolen from us. We will punish those responsible if we find them.
These thieves will feel the mighty wrath of the Dargathi people for the %1$d credits stolen from us, this crime will not be treated lightly.
We have had %1$d credits stolen from us. Perhaps this can be a learning opportunity. We hope to find out how they were stolen.
Others are jealous when they look at the riches of the mighty Swarm. Someone has stolen %1$d credits from us.
Someone has stolen %1$d credits from us. When we find out who is responsible we will destroy them.
Max of 2 can be selected, unselect to change
A mineral deposit has been depleted
The world %1$s has just had one of its mineral deposits completely depleted.
The planet %1$s has lost a mineral deposit.
Darkness has spread a little more on the world %1$s. A mineral deposit has been depleted there.
The world %1$s has suffered a complete depletion of one of its mineral deposits.
Statistics show that depletion of a mineral deposit was bound to happen and it just happened on the world %1$s.
%1$s has just lost a mineral deposit. We will not allow this to slow the spreading.
We have learned that mineral deposits on %1$s have been depleted. It is our hope that we can learn why and work to stop it from happening here.
We have lost a mineral deposit on %1$s, we will be diligent in looking for a cause.
It saddens us to report that our world %1$s has lost a mineral deposit, this will cost the Human Alliance.
The Light seems to be testing us by taking away that which is needed. A mineral deposit on %1$s has been completely depleted.
It is still unknown who is to blame but our world %1$s has been depleted of a mineral deposit.
Calculations have determined that we have miscalculated something… our world %1$s has lost a mineral deposit.
The Swarm has been affected poorly by the depletion of a mineral resource on our world %1$s.
Our republic chose to disregard the advice of our scientists, and now mineral deposits on %1$s have been depleted.
Report has come in of an unknown world losing a mineral deposit.
There has been a complete depletion of a mineral resource on an unknown world.
It has been revealed to us that a mineral deposits on an unknown world has been depleted.
Report has come in of an unknown world losing a mineral deposit.
Our sensors indicate that there has been a depletion of a mineral deposit on an unknown world.
There has been a depletion of a mineral deposit on an unknown world.
An unknown world has seen a depletion of mineral deposits.
At least one empire must be eliminated
All remaining empires are allied together

The concept of Oneness is as integral to an Ameoli as breathing. For eons, the swarms of the Ameoli homeworld battled for supremacy, each believing itself to be the only true consciousness. Eventually, one swarm reigned supreme: the Ameoli. Having bested its brethren and spread to all corners of its homeworld, the Ameoli Swarm now seeks to incorporate the galaxy into the Oneness.

Tenacity and adaptability; two traits virtually required for a slow-moving, slug-like species to reach the stars. Determined to achieve spaceflight, the Bylons shed their fragile physical forms and achieved a limited cybernetic ascension. This accomplished, they rapidly achieved spaceflight and seek now to explore and expand to places their frail ancestors could never have even dreamed of.

A fierce people from an equally fierce planet, the Dargathi are the barroom brawlers of the galaxy. Having grown tired of conflict and contest amongst themselves, the Dargathi cooperate with the sole intent of seeking out battle and conquest with other races. It does not take much to inspire a Dargathi to violence. If the Dargathi are not at war it simply means they have not yet met their next opponent.

"Though industrious and tenacious, the true strength of Humanity is shrewd negotiation. Humans are the galaxy's best negotiators, diplomats, and business-beings. However, underestimating the Human ability and willingness to engage in warfare is an unwise, and generally short-lived, mistake."

The Marrenaree are a friendly, generally happy people. They love to learn and view mistakes as an opportunity to learn and grow. Their fascination with the universe has enabled them to have a robust scientific knowledge. Be careful of angering them. They can be powerful enemies due to their scientific advancements.

"The Sothren religion boils down to one main tenet: 'Peace through superior firepower.' Though Sothren religious texts twist themselves into knots explaining and justifying how concepts like 'sanctity of life' can co-exist with 'swift and thorough retaliation', the bottom line when dealing with Sothren is to remember that they do not kill, until they, or their allies, are threatened."

"Centuries of war have shaped Tarlish society into a militant empire, prizing individual courage and honor above all else. However, despite their tactical prowess, Tarlish warriors are quick, even eager, to lay down their lives in service of the Imperium. 'Death before dishonor; death before cowardice; long live the Imperium.'"
All of the colonies have been destroyed
We regret that we must break our %1$s with you.
This %1$s is no longer beneficial to us.
It has come to our understanding that we must go our own way in regards to the %1$s
It is time for us to stand on our own. Our %1$s has come to an end.
Upon compiling the data we have determined that our %1$s must be terminated.
The Swarm should have known that working with outsiders would not be beneficial. We wish to end our %1$s
We are ending our %1$s with you. It no longer brings us joy.
We look forward to testing ourselves against you.
You shall regret this, the light has left you.
You cannot stop the spreading of the Swarm.
Let it begin. We will hold nothing back.
Be quick about it, we have little time for you.
It takes great patience to deal with you.
We should just end you now, for your own good.
The swarm does not like you.
Why are you here? What do you want?
"It's an honor to meet with you."
What can we do for you?
For what purpose has this meeting been called?
Why have you come before us?
Honored guest, how may we be of service.
"Hello! It's good to see you, what can we do for you?"
May Light be with you friend.
It is good to meet with you again.
It is good to meet with you again.
Welcome friend! What can I help you with?
"You're a sad pathetic race, you should fear the Tarlish people."
We have been forewarned of meeting such creatures as you.
How have you survived for so long?
You are another weak race that the Swarm will devour.
Our friends told us about you. They had nothing nice to say.
Greetings, we are the Tarlish Imperium.
It is a blessing to meet you.
We are the mighty Dargathi Empire, greetings.
Hello, we are the Bylon Collective.
We are pleased to meet you.
We are excited to meet such a honorable and powerful race.
We see great opportunities between our two races.
You are held highly in the Light, we are blessed in having met you.
Finally a worthy foe, it is good to meet you.
We see many advantages to this new contact between us.
It is wonderful to meet you! You appear to be a nation who also values friendship.
This does not change how we feel about you
Do you think us weak? That we would actually need anything from you
This will not cleanse you of your sins, you are still far from the Light
Is this normally how your species shows that it is inferior?
This is measured as a waste on your behalf. Transaction complete
The Swarm is displeased to receive a gift from you
If this were from anyone else, we would consider it an act of weakness
The Swarm will see what it can do with this, thank you
This is very much appreciated, we are honored to receive such a gift
You are too kind, we gratefully accept this gift
Blessed Be The Light! We gratefully accept this gift
Ahh good… Strength to you my friend!
We compute that this is highly beneficial, we are grateful
You make it easy for the Highest to like your race
What a wonderful gift! Thank you for thinking of us.
If that is what it has to be.
"It's not a fair trade but we still accept."
We will sacrifice for the greater good.
It is an awful deal, but we accept.
We have ran the numbers multiple times and unfortunately continue to receive affirmation that we must accept this offer.
The Highest informs us that she is not pleased, but that the offer will have to do.
We do not like you, but we like your offer.
It is accepted in the Light.
Yes, this will benefit both of our nations.
Sounds like an honorable deal to us.
We are grateful to be making such a deal!
Ah… Yes, this will serve us nicely. The Swarm accepts.
Our Republic is honored to accept this proposal and maintain our friendship.
Absolutely not! Do you wish to incur the wrath of the Highest?
We can see absolutely no reason to accept this offer.
We appreciate the proposal, but respectfully decline.
We have to refuse the offer, perhaps another time.
It pains us to have to refuse at this time.
We wish we could, but not this time.
Logically we must reject your proposal, though it saddens?… us to do so.
The offer is appreciated, however the Swarm cannot accept at this time.
We wish we could accept this proposal from such a great people, but cannot at this time.
If you had a higher understanding of mathematics and logic you would have agreed
ahh… We see, well we will inform the highest of your response. Perhaps at another time then.
There is a time and a place for all things. That thing for us lately has been war. But now it is time for peace. Let us make it so.
This war has been very costly to us, we would rather spend our resources and efforts on something else. Make peace with us.
We want to speak with you of a matter of great import. This war is no longer suitable for our radiance, we wish for peace.
It has been a good fight! But alas now should be the time of recuperation let us end the war so that we may regrow our strengths.
The time for war has run its course. It would be illogical to continue. Let us process the required documentation for peace.
This war lessens our number. That is something we cannot tolerate. Make peace with us.
We don’t want to fight anymore. Can we end this war?
It would be advantageous for both our peoples if we could join in a %1$s
We should work together to augment what we have. Let us sign a %1$s
The light has let us know that %1$s is needed between us. It would bless us both
Let us put our strengths together in a %1$s
Our system suggests that we should be engaging in a %1$s with you
The Ameoli know better than any other race the potential of working together… Join us in a %1$s
Allowing our races to work together would be so beneficial. Please join us in a %1$s.
We look forward to testing ourselves against you. (war declared)
You will not survive long against us. (war declared)
You are a disease that must be burnt away. (war declared)
You are to be eliminated. (war declared)
It is time for your extermination. (war declared)
We had hoped that it would not come to this. When diplomacy fails, war begins. (war declared)

The hyperspace flux appears to have ended. Our ships will no longer have the honor of dying for our society.
The hyperspace flux has ended. It is now safe to travel again.
The Light has seen fit to remove the hyperspace flux.
"The hyperspace flux has ended. We triumphed over it's laughable weakness."
The hyperspace flux has ended. It is now safe to travel again.
The hyperspace flux has ended. Our swarm may now travel again in safety.
The hyperspace flux has ended. We may now travel the galaxy in relative safety again.
The hyperspace flux has destroyed one of our ships. The crew will be celebrated for their honor.
Despite our caution, it appears that we lost a ship to the hyperspace flux. Our thoughts and prayers go to the people affected by this tragedy.
The Light has called one of our ships back to It. We must hold fast to our faith. The Light makes no mistakes.
We lost a ship to the hyperspace flux. However, one loss does not mean failure. We shall win next time!
One of our ships was lost to the hyperspace flux. We will use the knowledge gained to adapt future explorations.
It appears that even our strength and unity are no match for the hyperspace flux. We have lost a ship.
It appears that even with the smartest minds in the galaxy we still make mistakes. We have lost a ship to the hyperspace flux. We will learn from this.

We have learned that a hyperspace flux has started in space. This changes nothing. If our people are not willing to die when traveling, they will immediately be put to death. (Moving ships have a chance of being destroyed)
It appears that a hyperspace flux has begun somewhere in space. We must use caution when traveling to ensure the safety of our people. (Moving ships have a chance of being destroyed)
"It has been revealed to us by the Light that there is a hyperspace flux. We have faith in it's power to protect us during space travel. (Moving ships have a chance of being destroyed)"
We have heard of a hyperspace flux. This will not deter us, for it is just another foe to conquer! (Moving ships have a chance of being destroyed)
A hyperspace flux has been detected. Our people are working on how to adapt to this new challenge. (Moving ships have a chance of being destroyed)
Our smartest minds have determined that there is a hyperspace flux. We must use caution with our travel to avoid losing ships. (Moving ships have a chance of being destroyed)
Our scientists have discovered a hyperspace flux. We must listen to their warnings and use caution to avoid losing ships. (Moving ships have a chance of being destroyed)
hyperspace_flux_started_7 (Moving ships have a chance of being destroyed)
Perhaps it is time we send a Settler ship to %1$s. Its climate has improved.
The Light has blessed the world %1$s, by improving the climate there.
The climate on %1$s has improved. We should go there and take advantage of this.
Certain conditions have met in conjunction to the result of better climate on %1$s.
A world to which we have been, %1$s, has had an unexpected change to its climate for the better.
It appears the climate on %1$s has improved.
For the betterment of the Imperium and its people the climate on %1$s has improved.
Great news! The climate on %1$s has improved.
Our people on %1$s have been blessed. The climate has improved.
"Our empire has grown stronger by the sudden improvement of %1$s's climate."
For reasons uncalculated our world %1$s has seen an improvement in its climate.
The climate on our world %1$s has improved allowing it to support more of the Swarm.
To the surprise of our scientists, the climate on %1$s has seen great improvements. We have our smartest minds studying this event to see if we can replicate it.
We have heard that an unexplored world has undergone an improvement of its climate.
There has been a very fortunate climate event on an unknown world.
"A report has come in of an unknown world's climate has improved. Hopefully we shall be inspired to know of its location soon."
It has been brought to my attention that an unknown worlds climate has improved.
"Information has been passed to us that an unknown world's climate has been improved."
We have heard that an unknown world has seen a change for the better for its climate.
Our scientists have received information that an unknown world has seen an improvement in their climate. They are gathering more information to enable us to identify this planet.

New mineral deposits on %1$s will help us to continue to prosper.
We continue to be blessed by the Light. New mineral deposits were found on %1$s.
We have found new mineral deposits on %1$s. This will help in our struggle against our foes.
External sensors have detected a new deposit of minerals on our world %1$s.
A new deposit of mineral that will benefit the Swarm has just been to uncovered on our world %1$s.
Due to our scientists curiosity, we have discovered a new deposit of minerals on %1$s.

New mineral deposits have been found, unfortunately not on a world we know.

Maris, the homeworld of the Sothren, is an ocean world where 95% of the surface is water. The cities of Maris are massive floating complexes stretching far into the sky and deep underwater. The Sothren people have adapted very well to either environment.

"The destruction of this world seems to have been caused by its former inhabitants, of which there's no sign of any living. A new ring is forming around the planet from all the debris and the crust is undergoing significant changes. These events will give our planetary scientists great opportunity for research"

Marren is a planet covered in water, ice and land. It is filled with diverse vegetation and animal life both above and below the water. Curiosity about this environment created the thirst for information that has allowed their scientific achievements to grow.

The Human homeworld, a planet they call Earth, is mostly covered in water with several large land masses. It has a vast array of climates and cultures. The diversity of the cities of Earth represents the unique differences in the people of the Human race.

Crenar is the homeworld of the Dargathi. The planet suffered a later stage bombardment leaving a cratered landscape behind, a rare characteristic for a class T world. Life on Crenar was forced to evolve quickly through that destructive epoch. Ultimately it was the Dargathi people who would be born from the ashes of the old world.

"There are ruins covering the planet and the remains of many solar shielding attempts in the lower orbit. The planet's former inhabitants went to extreme measures to combat the global warming that they had caused, but in the end they failed. There are no other signs of the race throughout the system, strange for this obviously space faring race to be constrained to their dying homeworld"

Sacrai is the homeworld of the Ameoli. It is barely within limits to be classified a Terran. Some of its unique features include the purple Hue of its atmosphere or its large cave network that the Ameoli have used to their advantage. The surface has a vast range of vivid plant life that adds to the colorful nature of the planet.

"Makar is the Homeworld of the Tarlish people. It is a Terran class planet with a ring system of mostly Water Ice, that adds to the surface's beautiful vistas. Both plant and animal life have adapted well to this mostly developed world."

"This planet has an impressive ring especially for being such a small world, this is due to its high mass and strong tidal forces it had on its previous moons. The extremely high mineral content of those moons have made this a mineral rich world. This planet's beauty and resources would be highly beneficial to the race that lays claim to it"

Kormal, the homeworld of the Bylons, was once a beautiful world of mostly tropic islands. Now the islands are mostly covered in chaos of industrialization from the mechanized life forms. This seemingly unorganized state of the cities make Kormal a difficult place to live for non Bylons.
%1$d%% science increase for their colonies in this system

%1$d%% science increase for your colonies in this system
Planet / Colony Info - Show the info for the planet and pressing this will take you to the planet screen
From this screen you can see a list of your colonies, uninhabited planets, and inhabited planets.
Production Info - Shows you what the colony is currently working on and pressing this to the production screen for that colony
Extra large planets have a high chance of having High gravity, and also the most space for population to expand on to
Large planets have a chance of having High gravity, and also the more space for population to expand on to
Medium sized planets most likely have normal gravity, with a moderate amount of space for the population
Small planets are likely to have low gravity, with the smallest amount of space for the population
"Their systems will refuel your ships and a promise to help defend when attacked"

Exploration data on systems including data on planets
"A promise of non aggression, increases positive relations toward each empire"
Makes peace and end the state of war
"Research Treaty will start off losing money but each turn will loose less then will generate research"
"Trade treaty will start off losing money but each turn will become more efficient"
Our intel suggests that another race has made a breakthrough in science.
We have just learned that another race has just made a major breakthrough in their research.
We have heard that another race has just had a research breakthrough.
We have heard that another race has had a research breakthrough. We will just have to test our strength against their wit.
Scientists of another race have just had a major breakthrough in their research.
Another race has had a breakthrough in science.
Our scientists applaud the scientific breakthrough of another race.
Glory and Honor be to our scientists their hard work has led to a breakthrough, earning us %1$d research points.
Our researchers continually push the bounds of what was thought to be possible and have made another great breakthrough, earning us %1$d research points.
Our scientists have been inspired and have had a breakthrough in their research with a gain of %1$d research points.
Our scientists show their great intelligence by giving us a major breakthrough research. %1$d research points gained.
We have compiled more and more information and our understanding of the universe has increased. This major research breakthrough gives us %1$d research points.

The knowledge of the Swarm continues to increase, as our best and brightest minds link themselves in greater and greater understanding. Another breakthrough has occurred, giving us %1$d research points.
Our scientists tireless research had led to an increase in %1$d research points. We are grateful for their knowledge.
Press on the icon to get a description of the tech
The percent complete will be shown on the top right

Orange stars have a great chance for habitable planets and a poor chance for mineral rich ones
Red stars have a poor chance for habitable planets and a very low chance for mineral rich ones
White stars have a good chance for habitable planets and a good chance for mineral rich ones
Yellow stars have a great chance for habitable planets and a good chance for mineral rich ones

Unable to change the system name. You are not the only empire in this system.
Unable to change the system name. You do not have a presence in this system.
The Swarm will now be allowed to spread with no limitations set upon it. All will live by the rule and might of the Ameoli, under the direction of the highest.
We have adapted to come this far and we will continue to do so, to push the bounds of what is possible. With logic and intelligence the Bylon Collective will govern all.
We are victorious! With the support of our allies we have prevailed over our common enemies to bring peace back to the galaxy
We have proven the strength and might of the Dargathi Empire! There were none that could stand before us. We are pleased that some did not make it easy… The fight was glorious!
"The wars have raged on for long enough and have been very costly to us. Now they are finished, we can rebuild and improve. All will prosper under the leadership of the Human Alliance."
The journey to victory was not easy, and the loss of educated minds was great. However, our republic has proved that ingenuity and perseverance always leads to victory.

Though the loss of life is unfortunate, our cause was just and our path foreordained. We succeeded in eliminating darkness and spreading light. At long last this part of the galaxy can now thrive under the guidance of the Sothren Federation.
We traveled to the stars in search for greater honor. Though the path was not easy we were successful in our search. Long live the Tarlish Imperium!

The wormhole connecting %1$s and %2$s has just collapsed. We will be looking into how this will affect the Imperium.
It has been brought to our attention that the wormhole connecting %1$s and %2$s has just collapsed.
The Holy Light has decided to collapse the wormhole between %1$s and %2$s.
The connection via wormhole between %1$s and %2$s has collapsed. It is regretful to lose the quickness of our military movement between these systems.
Wormhole between %1$s and %2$s has just collapsed. Our scientists are fascinated by the event.
The wormhole connecting %1$s and %2$s has just collapsed this will affect the Swarms movement between those worlds.
The wormhole between %1$s and %2$s has collapsed. Our scientists are using this opportunity to gain more information on future wormhole events.
Our honorable agents have just informed us of a wormhole has collapsed somewhere in the galaxy.
Our agents has discovered that a wormhole has just collapsed somewhere in the galaxy.
We have been informed by our agents that a wormhole has just collapsed somewhere in the galaxy.
Our agents have just heard of a wormhole collapse somewhere in the galaxy.
Agents from the Collective have just informed us of a collapse of a wormhole linking two unknown systems.
Our agents have just communicated with us of a collapse wormhole somewhere in the galaxy.
Somewhere in the galaxy a wormhole has collapsed.
Reports have come in that the wormhole at %1$s has just collapsed.
We have just been informed that the wormhole at %1$s has collapsed.
The wormhole that was connected to %1$s has closed. We believe this is an act of protection from the Light.
The wormhole connecting %1$s to an unknown system has collapsed. Our generals are still trying to decide if this is a good thing or not.
The wormhole at %1$s has just collapsed. The numbers and calculations involved are amazing! We hope to learn more from this event.
The spreading of the Swarm has been slowed by the collapse of the wormhole at %1$s.
The wormhole between %1$s and an unknown system has collapsed. We are saddened by the lost opportunity to gain more knowledge.
Our people may now use a new wormhole between the systems of %1$s and %2$s.
Systems %1$s and %2$s are now connected by a new wormhole. The Human Alliance will prosper from this fortunate event.
The Sothren Concordate has been blessed by the connection of two of the systems %1$s and %2$s via wormhole. This is truly a sign of the light blessing us in our cause.
Two systems, %1$s and %2$s have just been connected by a wormhole. This event will make the combat in these systems much easier.
Two systems we know %1$s and %2$s have just been connected via wormhole. The probability of this happening is quite rare.
Systems %1$s and %2$s have been connected by a new wormhole. This will help in the spreading of the Swarm.
We have learned about a wormhole between the systems of %1$s and %2$s.
An amazing event has just occurred somewhere in the Galaxy. Two systems are now linked together by the formation of a new wormhole.
A new wormhole has open somewhere in the galaxy.
It has been revealed to us that two systems have just been connected somewhere in the Galaxy by a wormhole.
A wormhole has just connected two unknown systems.
We have compiled the information of a new wormhole forming somewhere in the galaxy.
A new wormhole has connected two star systems, hopefully we will locate the connection soon.
We have learned about a wormhole opening somewhere in the galaxy. We are hopeful our scientists can discover it’s location soon.
We must make sure of our defenses in the %1$s system or any systems around it. It has just been opened up to an unknown system by a wormhole.
New possibilities come with the opening of a new wormhole in the %1$s system. It is unknown where it leads.
The system of %1$s has had a wormhole opened to it. We must be cautious of the evil that could come out of it.
A wormhole has opened in %1$s leading to an unknown system. This may provide a good staging point against a new and worthy foe.
A wormhole has just opened in %1$s system. It is unknown where it leads to.
System %1$s is now connected to an unknown system. This could open up a new part of the galaxy to the Swarm.
A wormhole has opened up in %1$s. Where it leads is unknown, but we are hopeful that great scientific discoveries lay on the other side.
Allows instantaneous travel to another star system
Climate has worsened on %1$s a sign we should stay clear of that place.
A world we have been to has worsened. %1$s is the place.
We have detected a change in the climate on the world %1$s. It has gotten worse.
The climate has changed for the worse on the world %1$s.
The climate on %1$s has worsened. We are gathering information so that we do not make the same mistakes.
TThe people on %1$s will have to hold to honor. Their lives have just gotten harder. The climate there has worsened.
Unfortunately our people on %1$s have had their lives poorly impacted by the worsening of the climate there.
Darkness has spread to the world %1$s. Its climate has suddenly worsened.
The people on %1$s will have to become stronger, for the climate there has worsened.
Our people on %1$s now have to live in a worsened climate. We do not understand the cause for the change.
"The Highness is saddened by the sudden worsening of %1$s's climate."
The climate on %1$s has worsened. Scientists had warned us this would happen. We must take what we learn from this and share the knowledge with other worlds.
"Our sources say that an unknown world's climate has worsened."
Climate on an unknown world has worsened.
We have had word that an unknown world has suddenly experienced a worsening of its climate.
The climate has worsened on an unknown world. Hopefully this will not happen to any of our colonies.
"Information has just been compiled of an unknown world's climate worsening."
The climate on a world not known to the Swarm has worsened.
And unknown world has experienced a worsening of their climate.
